languages.text: "...служит напоминанием о священной миссии Вольных Торговцев, что все думы и стремления направляют к одной цели — служению Его Воле..."
"...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."
languages.original_text: "...служит напоминанием о священной миссии Вольных Торговцев, что все думы и стремления направляют к одной цели — служению Его Воле..."

traits.locale_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."
"...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."
"...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

languages.text: “……提醒着行商浪人的神圣使命。行商浪人的每个想法与愿望，都指向同一个目标，那就是为祂的意志服务……”
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: “……提醒着行商浪人的神圣使命。行商浪人的每个想法与愿望，都指向同一个目标，那就是为祂的意志服务……”

languages.text: «... sirve como recordatorio de la sagrada misión de los Comerciantes Independientes, para quienes todo pensamiento y aspiración tiene una sola razón de ser: hacer la voluntad del Emperador...».
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: «... sirve como recordatorio de la sagrada misión de los Comerciantes Independientes, para quienes todo pensamiento y aspiración tiene una sola razón de ser: hacer la voluntad del Emperador...».

languages.text: 「…自由開拓者の神聖なる使命を思い出させるものとして機能している。自由開拓者のすべての考えと願いは1つの目標ーー皇帝の意志へ奉仕する事に向いているのだ…」
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: 「…自由開拓者の神聖なる使命を思い出させるものとして機能している。自由開拓者のすべての考えと願いは1つの目標ーー皇帝の意志へ奉仕する事に向いているのだ…」

languages.text: "... dient als Erinnerung an die heilige Mission der Freihändler, deren Gedanken und Streben auf ein einziges Ziel ausgerichtet sind – Seinem Willen zu dienen ..."
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: "... dient als Erinnerung an die heilige Mission der Freihändler, deren Gedanken und Streben auf ein einziges Ziel ausgerichtet sind – Seinem Willen zu dienen ..."

languages.text: « ... fait office de rappel de la mission sacrée des libres-marchands, dont l'ensemble des pensées et aspirations ne sont dirigées que vers un seul objectif : l'accomplissement de Sa volonté... »
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: « ... fait office de rappel de la mission sacrée des libres-marchands, dont l'ensemble des pensées et aspirations ne sont dirigées que vers un seul objectif : l'accomplissement de Sa volonté... »

languages.text: "Düşünceleri ve arzuları tek bir hedefe, O'nun iradesine hizmet etmeye yönelik olan Hür Tacirlerin kutsal vazifesinin bir hatırlatıcısı olma görevi görüyor."
languages.original_text: "...serves as a reminder of the sacred mission of the Rogue Traders, whose every thought and aspiration is directed toward one goal — the service of His will..."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünceleri ve arzuları tek bir hedefe, O'nun iradesine hizmet etmeye yönelik olan Hür Tacirlerin kutsal vazifesinin bir hatırlatıcısı olma görevi görüyor."
